fields.title: Basic Bicycle Maintenance
fields.description: Learn puncture repair, brake adjustments, chain lubrication and safety checks.

fields.title: Intermediate Drivetrain Tuning
fields.description: Indexing gears, replacing cables/housing, derailleur alignment and troubleshooting noise.

fields.title: Advanced Wheel Truing & Hubs
fields.description: Tension balance, lateral/radial true, dishing, hub overhaul and bearing preload.

fields.title: E-Bike Systems Fundamentals
fields.description: Safety, connectors, sensors, common mid-drive vs hub systems and diagnostic basics.

fields.title: Hydraulic Brakes Masterclass
fields.description: Bleeding procedures, pad/rotor selection, lever reach/biting point and contamination fixes.

fields.title: Cycling Safety & First Aid
fields.description: Basic first aid, emergency repairs, safety gear and accident prevention strategies.

fields.title: Bike Fit Essentials
fields.description: Understanding bike fit, saddle height, reach adjustments and common fit issues.

fields.title: Cycling Nutrition & Hydration
fields.description: Fueling for performance, hydration strategies, recovery nutrition and meal planning.

fields.title: Mountain Bike Skills Development
fields.description: Cornering, climbing techniques, descending control and obstacle navigation.

fields.title: Urban Cycling Techniques
fields.description: Navigating traffic, bike handling in urban environments, and safety tips.

fields.title: Cycling for Fitness
fields.description: Building endurance, interval training, and cycling as a fitness routine.

fields.title: History and Evolution of Bicycles
fields.description: Explore the origins of bicycles, key technological milestones, cultural impact, and how bikes evolved into the machines we ride today.
